sentence.Network_cn: 3名男子被一个变节警察开枪打死。

sentence.Network_en: The renegade is the first cousin to a rattlesnake.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛徒象响尾蛇一样地毒狠.

sentence.Network_en: When he was doing underground work he was arrested because a renegade informed against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他做地下工作时,曾因叛徒告密而被捕.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Spanish renegado, from medieval Latin renegatus 'renounced', past participle (used as a noun) of renegare, from re- (expressing intensive force) + Latin negare 'deny'

encyclopedia.content: 这是eminem和jay-z合唱的一首歌，收录在jay-z的专辑blueprint下。另有希腊裔美国音乐家雅尼的一首同名音乐作品，其收录于《Tribute》专辑中。

entry.tran: 叛徒;变节者;改变宗教信仰（或政见）者
entry.def: A renegade is a person who abandons the religious, political, or philosophical beliefs that he or she used to have, and accepts opposing or different beliefs.

entry.tran: 离经叛道的;叛逆的;变节的
entry.def: Renegade is used to describe a member of a group or profession who behaves in a way that is opposed to the normal behaviour or beliefs of that group or profession.

example.ex: Three men were shot dead by a renegade policeman.
example.tran: 3名男子被一个变节警察开枪打死。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who rebels and becomes an outlaw
2. a disloyal person who betrays or deserts his cause or religion or political party or friend etc.
1. having deserted a cause or principle;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新

re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明

re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,表示"状态,物品"; 2. "个人或集体"

cock帽边+ade状态,物品→n.帽章

negate否认+ive……的→negative否定的
